processingCommand.script:
! Prepare incident status
:IF &RESTORE_COMPLETED# = "false"
:  SET &TMP#                   = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UPGRADE.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "CTASK_CLOSE_NOTES", 1)
:  RESOLVE &CTASK_CLOSE_NOTES# = "&TMP#"
:  SET &CTASK_CLOSE_STATE#     = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UPGRADE.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "CTASK_CLOSE_STATE", 1)
:  SET &CTASK_CLOSE_CODE#      = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UPGRADE.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "CTASK_CLOSE_CODE", 1)

:  SET &TMP#                   =  GET_VAR(CONFIG.UPGRADE.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "RFSC_CLOSE_NOTES", 1)
:  RESOLVE &RFSC_CLOSE_NOTES#  = "&TMP#"
:  SET &RFSC_CLOSE_CODE#       = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UPGRADE.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "RFSC_CLOSE_CODE", 1)
:  SET &RFSC_CLOSE_STATE#      = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UPGRADE.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "RFSC_CLOSE_STATE", 1)
:ELSE
:  SET &TMP#                   = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UPGRADE.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "CTASK_CLOSE_NOTES_FAILED", 1)
:  RESOLVE &CTASK_CLOSE_NOTES# = "&TMP#"
:  SET &CTASK_CLOSE_STATE#     = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UPGRADE.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "CTASK_CLOSE_STATE_FAILED", 1)
:  SET &CTASK_CLOSE_CODE#      = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UPGRADE.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "CTASK_CLOSE_CODE_FAILED", 1)

:  SET &TMP#                   =  GET_VAR(CONFIG.UPGRADE.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "RFSC_CLOSE_NOTES_FAILED", 1)
:  RESOLVE &RFSC_CLOSE_NOTES#  = "&TMP#"
:  SET &RFSC_CLOSE_CODE#       = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UPGRADE.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "RFSC_CLOSE_CODE_FAILED", 1)
:  SET &RFSC_CLOSE_STATE#      = GET_VAR(CONFIG.UPGRADE.DSC-WM-LATAM.V, "RFSC_CLOSE_STATE_FAILED", 1)
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &CTASK_CLOSE_NOTES#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &CTASK_CLOSE_STATE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &CTASK_CLOSE_CODE#,,WORKFLOW

:PUBLISH &RFSC_CLOSE_NOTES#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RFSC_CLOSE_CODE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RFSC_CLOSE_STATE#,,WORKFLOW
